entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
